name: CedrickOnline's Halloween Hoorah
description:
World renowned streamer CedrickOnline is pitted against his toughest foe yet. Will he survive his visit to Middle Finger, Massachusetts, or will his visit survive him? Find out in this thrilling halloween adventure! 

Made in 1 week for the Halloween Supreme Game Jam.

- ! Controles ! -

W,A,S,D - You know what these do, pog champ >w<

Space - View a tip while exploring the world.

Left Shift - Perform a dodge roll to escape your enemies!

Enter - Speed up the boring text after talking to the Priest for the fifteenth time.

10/29/2020
